name: Box Box [DEMO]
description:
This is a DEMO. This is not a finished product, 

Box Box is a totally accurate box delivery simulator. 

Features
Smash boxes and deliver them  to get more points! 
Be careful with the fragile boxes, you're not paid for breaking those!
Flip boxes with "This way up" labels upside down to get bonus pr 
Four different box priority levels: hold low priority (white tape) boxes for as long as you can to get more points and deliver high priority boxes (red tape) as fast as you can for a bonus!
Decorate your room with money you've earned by delivering boxes!
Personalize the UI by changing the primary and secondary colors
More features coming in the 1.0 Release

Download the game

  •  Follow me on Twitter for more updates
  •  Join my Discord server
  •  Support me on Patreon for exclusive items and a special Discord role

v1.0 Features
These features will be added in a 1.0 version of the game

  • More decorations
    More ways to spend money and decorate your room
  • More box types
    Even more boxes to deliver!
  •  Turbo mode
    Increase the difficulty! Boxes will spawn faster and box limit will be increased!
  • Customizable backgrounds
    Bored of the dirty warehouse? Save some money and move somewhere else?
  • Achievements
    Like challenges? Why not try to complete all the achievements and get exclusive rewards?
  • Official Google Play Store download page
    If we reach the $20 goal on Patreon, Box Box will have an official download page on the Google Play Store.
  •  Support for Linux on ARM
    Running Linux on your Raspberry Pi or a phone? Why not try Box Box on it?
